Hi ime new and all that stuff, however i have been playing KSP for over a year and only new to the forum. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Thank you.

Hello UnknownOrbit, and welcome to the forums!

There's a thread called [How Not to Flip](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122142-HOW-NOT-TO-FLIP-Some-Crazy-Things-I-ve-Gotten-to-Orbit-And-How) over in the Tutorials section of the forums. That should get you started.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the forums, UnknownOrbit. Enjoy the community! I've had many rockets point the wrong way up and cause me not to go to space today. The new atmosphere is an adjustment if you're used to the old one, but I'm sure you'll have a grasp of it in no time.
